nodes.text: The Ogden's Hope security station was a location in Ogden's Hope, a town on the planet Elphrona. It was the headquarters of Ogden's Hope security. During the High Republic Era, when the Blythe family was attacked by Nihil pirates, they contacted the security station, but the members of the security force were too scared to try and help. The transmission was overheard by Eye of the Nihil Marchion Ro, who alerted the Jedi of the nearby Elphrona Outpost about the raid as part of a plan to capture one of the Jedi.
